proposal1.heroHeadline: Gorilla 76 is losing over 1,000 hours a year on manual proposals. Here's how to stop the clock.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, creating a proposal is a manual slog. With our system, generate a complete branded proposal in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are not just inefficiencies; they're ongoing losses eating into your potential growth.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Spending hours crafting each proposal means less time for closing deals. With 53 team members, this adds up to thousands of lost hours annually.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Every proposal that lacks brand alignment weakens your positioning. This inconsistency can cost you potential clients who expect a unified message.

problems.title: Missed Opportunities
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed chances. Every day a proposal is late, another opportunity slips through your fingers, costing potential revenue.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled marketers to do repetitive tasks is costly. This is money bleeding out instead of being invested in strategic growth.

problems.title: Proposal Revisions
problems.description: Reworking proposals wastes time and resources. Every revision is a step back instead of forward, draining efficiency and morale.

problems.title: Tracking Challenges
problems.description: Without effective tracking, follow-ups are inefficient. This leads to lost leads and diminished closing rates, costing you business.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these inefficiencies with streamlined, automated precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, each proposal takes hours to complete. Our system does it in 47 seconds, freeing up your team for higher-value tasks.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual branding efforts cause inconsistencies. Our AI ensures every proposal perfectly aligns with Gorilla 76's brand, every time.

solutions.title: Real-Time Tracking
solutions.description: Tracking proposals manually leads to missed leads. Our system includes tracking, so you never lose a prospect again.

solutions.title: AI-Powered Revisions
solutions.description: Revisions currently waste hours. Our AI provides instant, intelligent adjustments, keeping your proposals sharp and timely.

solutions.title: Labor Cost Reduction
solutions.description: High labor costs drain your budget. Our system automates proposal creation, reducing the need for excessive human intervention.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Gorilla 76's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Gorilla 76 around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Gorilla 76.

problems.description: Your current conversion rate is below industry standards, resulting in a 20% loss in potential revenue each quarter.

problems.title: Ineffective Targeting

lead.company_description:
THE INDUSTRIAL MARKETING AGENCY. We help B2B companies in the manufacturing ecosystem grow through revenue-focused marketing programs.

We know the manufacturing sector. For more than a decade, we've built our expertise working with B2B companies throughout the manufacturing ecosystem. Our clients include engineering-heavy OEMs, custom machine builders, contract manufacturers, robotics integrators and industry 4.0 tech companies.

We are guided by our core values of results, improvement, relationships, kindness and inclusivity.
